Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 69th/Winchester
ShortDescription: Eastbound 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, Ashland, and 69th due to, street blockage near 69th/Winchester.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 67th, Ashland, and 69th due to, street blockage near 69th/Winchester.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
